title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Special Weekly Rewards
content:
Through October 2, GTA+ Members unlock new benefits each week:

- September 5: An extra 20% discount on all vehicles at The Vinewood Car Club
- September 12: New and returning Bat and Knife weapon finishes
- September 19: The Broker Prolaps Basketball Top and Shorts, Gold Beat Off Earphones, and Apricot Perseus Cap
- September 26: Exclusive vehicle paint schemes

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
